org-name: Ubungano bwa Albinism bwa Zambia - AFZ
hero-description: Ubungano bwa Albinism bwa Zambia bwaishimikisha ukulwila amalungelo ya bantu abakwata albinism, ukulwila ukumona, no kumaka icalo cali bwino apo bonse bapona ukucita bwino.
mission-statement: Ukulwila amalungelo, icine, no kukwatania kwa bantu abakwata albinism ku Zambia ukupitila mu mipango ya ukumona, ukulwila milandu, incito sha kubafwa, no kukweza icalo.
focus-rights-desc: Ukulwila ukucinja kwa milandu no kwikala kuti bantu bonse abakwata albinism bakwate amulandu yafwana.
focus-awareness-desc: Ukumanyisha amako aya albinism pamo no kulwana ne fyo bafwaya, ifyo baletontonkanya, no ubwikashi ukupitila mu mipango ya ukumona.
focus-support-desc: Ukupa incito shifunikile ukuti kugawana imilombe ya kwikala ku calo, inyanja sha kwikala, no kubeleshesha ukufikila ku mabilingi.
focus-education-desc: Ukubonako ukuti abaana abakwata albinism bafikila amashilo ayafwanene pamo no kubafwa okwanisha.
news-1-title: AFZ Yatamfya Ukusalila Ukumona Mu Calo Conse
news-1-excerpt: Ukusalila kwesu ukumona ukufika kumyushi ya kumafulo mu Zambia yonse ukulwana ubwikashi no kulwila ukumfwana.
news-2-title: Ukupambana Kumilandu: Amacito Ayasanu Ayakwikala Yamineeshwa
news-2-excerpt: Ubusumbu bwaminesha amacito ayasanu ayamilandu ayakwikala abantu abakwata albinism kubukali no bwikashi.
news-3-excerpt: AFZ yawandafye ukusala amashilo ukupapata abantwana ba 200 abonjezeko abakwata albinism kumashiwi yonse.
cta-description: Pamo, twingapange Zambia apo abantu abakwata albinism baleikala nakucingilwa, ubufwanane, nama mulandu.
address: AFZ ZAMBIA, LOTI HOUSE, Cairo Road, Room G, 4th Floor, 10101 Lusaka, Zambia (opposite Kwacha House)
awareness-description: Pamo, tulephula ubwiko no kumona amasango alakwisha pa albinism. Ukupitila mu kushila, ukusala, nama bafwikishi ba lukuta, tulapanga isonde apo umuntu uliyonse akwata albinism akonka ukulikala nakucingilwa, ubufwanane, nama kuteminika.
awareness-stat-1-desc: Abantu mu calo conse balabyalwa na albinism
donate-page-description: Icipoboshi cenu cilabafisha ukulwila amalungelo, ukucingilwa, nama kupapata kwa bantu abakwata albinism mu Zambia. Icipoboshi ciliyonse cilasandulika mu kumaka icalo cipapukane.
impact-desc-sunscreen: Ukupa amafuta yakwikala ku isuba ku muntu ukwata albinism ukwashika amyeshi 3
impact-desc-workshop: Ukulipila amashilo yakumona mu lukuta lumwi
impact-desc-education: Ukubafya ifyuma fyamashilo ku baana ba 10 abakwata albinism
security-note: ðŸ”’ Icipoboshi cenu cilaikewa bwino. Mulatwalikilwa ku mpanga shaikala sha kupilila.
alternative-volunteer-desc: Shitanina mu lukuta lwesu lwa bafwikishi no kubafisha na mashili yenu.
alternative-corporate-desc: Shirikishanini naife pa milimo ya balebenshi, CSR, nama kupanga amashintu ya mulukuta.
alternative-supplies-desc: Upeni amafuta yakwikala ku isuba, inyanja shakwikala, ifyuma fyamashilo, nangu ifyuma ifine ifunikile.
slide-1-desc: AFZ ilakupa amafuta yakwikala ku isuba ku baana abakwata albinism mu Zambia yonse.
slide-2-desc: Umwana uliyonse alafwile ukwikelwa ku isuba. AFZ ilaonako ukuti paliya ashiwa.
slide-3-desc: Ukubomba pamo na miyushi, ubusumbu, nama bashirika ukulwila amalungelo ya bantu abakwata albinism.
slide-4-desc: Amakwebo yesu yalipelela yalabomba takakwata ukukonkelesha no kuiminisha inshila shakusala.
slide-5-desc: Albinism ilacitikapo mwa cilengeleshi pa byuumi byonse, ukutemwika ubwikalo bwa bushintu bwa majini.

events.title: Ificifike - Ubungano bwa Albinism bwa Zambia

hero.title: Ificifike nama Milimo
hero.subtitle: Shitanina ku fficifike fyesu fyaukulwila, amashilo, nama milimo yamulukuta mu Zambia yonse

resources.title: Ibokosi lya Fikingilo - Ubungano bwa Albinism bwa Zambia

hero.title: Ibokosi lya Fikingilo nama Sambo lya Mashilo
hero.subtitle: Patanini ifikingilo fyalashila, amatontonkanyo, nama ifikingilo fyakubafisha amakwebo ya bantu abakwata albinism
